RitualOutcomeEffectDef.description: If the baptism ritual goes well (positive outcome), the baptized colonist will be instantly converted. A negative outcome will cause a mood penalty and strengthen their original beliefs.\n\nBaptism will be more effective if started near large bodies of water (20 water tiles in a 10 tile radius).

li.label: Blasphemous
li.description: The {0} was blasphemous. The ritual was an affront to the holiness of water. This desecration will linger in our thoughts.

li.label: Underwhelming
li.description: The {0} was underwhelming. The ceremony lacked the spirit and grace it deserved. It felt hollow and uninspired.

li.label: Refreshing
li.description: The {0} was refreshing. That was a delightful moment of connection with the holy water. It left us feeling renewed.

li.label: Transcendent
li.description: The {0} was transcendent! This ritual was a profound experience, an unforgettable communion with the sacred flow of life.
